sqlMap.sql: ID, BIDDER_ACCOUNT, BIDDER_TRADEMARK, PROJECT_CODE, PRICE, BID_OPERATOR_ACCOUNT, IP, STATUS, CHECK_STATUS, CHECK_REMARK, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFY, OPERATOR

isNotEmpty.isNotEmpty: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS NUMROW, p.* from (

sqlMap.insert: insert into AUCTION_FREE_BID_HIS (ID, BIDDER_ACCOUNT, BIDDER_TRADEMARK, PROJECT_CODE, PRICE, BID_OPERATOR_ACCOUNT, IP, STATUS, CHECK_STATUS, CHECK_REMARK, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFY, OPERATOR) values (#id:DECIMAL#, #bidderAccount:VARCHAR#, #bidderTrademark:VARCHAR#, #projectCode:VARCHAR#, #price:DECIMAL#, #bidOperatorAccount:VARCHAR#, #ip:VARCHAR#, #status:VARCHAR#, #checkStatus:VARCHAR#, #checkRemark:VARCHAR#, sysdate, sysdate, #operator:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.select: select count(1) from ( select t.ID, t.BIDDER_ACCOUNT, t.BIDDER_TRADEMARK, t.PROJECT_CODE, t.PRICE, t.BID_OPERATOR_ACCOUNT, t.IP, t.STATUS, t.CHECK_STATUS, t.CHECK_REMARK, t.GMT_CREATE, t.GMT_MODIFY, t.OPERATOR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY BIDDER_ACCOUNT,project_code ORDER BY GMT_CREATE DESC ) rn from AUCTION_FREE_BID_HIS t where t.PROJECT_CODE = #projectCode:VARCHAR# and status='B' )a where a.rn=1

select * from ( select t.ID, t.BIDDER_ACCOUNT, t.BIDDER_TRADEMARK, t.PROJECT_CODE, t.PRICE, t.BID_OPERATOR_ACCOUNT, t.IP, t.STATUS, t.CHECK_STATUS, t.CHECK_REMARK, t.GMT_CREATE, t.GMT_MODIFY, t.OPERATOR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY BIDDER_ACCOUNT,project_code ORDER BY GMT_CREATE DESC ) rn from AUCTION_FREE_BID_HIS t where t.PROJECT_CODE = #projectCode:VARCHAR# and status='B' )a where a.rn=1 order by GMT_CREATE desc
select count(*) from AUCTION_FREE_BID_HIS where bidder_account=#bidderAccount:VARCHAR# and project_code=#projectCode:VARCHAR#
